text: A person commits the offense of misdemeanor insurance fraud if that person knowingly engages in conduct specified in § 22-3225.02 with the intent to defraud or to fraudulently obtain property of another.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-144, see notes following § 22-3225.02.

DC CODE § 22-3225.03a

Current through December 11, 2012

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.

chapter.text: Theft; Fraud; Stolen Property; Forgery; and Extortion.
